text:
@TrumpWarRoom @maddow What's True:
During a campaign rally in South Carolina on Feb 28th, Trump likened the criticism of his response to the new coronavirus outbreak to efforts to impeach him, saying "this is their (Dems) new hoax." He also downplayed severity of the outbreak, comparing it to the flu.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
